questions.question: What is the purpose of creating a catalog on WhatsApp Business, as demonstrated in the videos?
options: A) To share memes and jokes with customers
B) To showcase products/services and facilitate sales
C) To connect with friends and family

questions.question: What is the name of your inventory on WhatsApp Business?
What is the WhatsApp Status feature, and how is it useful for business owners?
options: A) It allows you to share disappearing text, photos, and videos about your products/services
B) It's similar to Facebook feed but permanent
C) It's only for personal updates, not business promotion

questions.question: What questions should you ask WhatsApp TV owners or influencers before working with them, as advised in the videos?
options: A) Their favorite color and food
B) Details about their followers, engagement, evidence of work, and promotion methods
